snippet.title: Micro Hexagon - Super Hexagon C64 demake
snippet.description:
A Commodore 64 demake of Terry Cavanagh's Super Hexagon. Recorded from a CRT monitor connected to my C64.
Code: Paul Koller
Music: Mikkel Hastrup
This is an entry in the 2013 RGCD 16KB cartridge competition: http://www.rgcd.co.uk/2013/05/c64-16kb-cartridge-game-development.html
Follow me for more info on my C64 stuff: https://twitter.com/paulko64
Grab your copy here: http://csdb.dk/release/?id=125132
